name: German Pronunciation
description: You can practice and improve your German pronunciation with this simple app. It works offline and so is very handy. Learn German pronunciation by listening to how words are pronounced and repeating them. It is important to learn the right pronunciation of German words from the beginning. Learn and improve your German vocabulary the right way by practicing every day. Learn German daily through practice using this German Pronunciation app to improve your German pronunciations.   This German Pronunciation app is a quick tool to reach out to when in doubt. Simply enter the text and you will hear a pronunciation of the word.   Just use this app anytime youre confused about the right pronunciation of a word. It is very useful to all, students, tourists, teachers, workers, etc. who may need to check the pronunciation of a word on the go. It is a simple app to help you learn and speak German the right way.  Speak confidently with your friends, boss, colleagues, and tourists. Good pronunciation is essential for learning, speaking and understanding German well.  The ultimate mobile German pronunciation aid, for all. The German Pronunciation app helps you learn, practice and play with words wherever you are. German Pronunciation app teaches you how to learn to pronounce German text properly.   Main Features:  - Clear pronunciation of words  - Simple straightforward interface - History of learned words - Small app size - Works offline - Settings screen to regulate speech rate and pitch
